### making plots 
 1. A bivariate scatterplot
 
```{r bivariate}

# looking at response times by word frequency - 

bivariate_plot <- danish %>% 
                    ggplot() +
                    aes(x = LogWordFreq, y = LogRT) +
                    geom_jitter() +
                    geom_smooth(method = "lm")
                  

```
 
 2. A boxplot with different fill colors
 
```{r boxplot}

fill_colors <- beginningReaders %>% 
                ggplot(aes(x = Subject, y = LogRT, fill = ReadingScore)) +
                geom_boxplot() +
                theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, size = 5))
?element_text
?geom_bar

```
 
 3. A plot of your choice that includes a stat_summary and a facet.


```{r statsummary}
statsummary <- english %>%
                ggplot() +
                stat_summary(mapping = aes(x = WordCategory, y = RTnaming), fun.data = mean_sdl, geom  = "pointrange") + 
                facet_grid( ~ AgeSubject)

?stat_summary
```
